description: A modern classic of a holographic sight.  Holographic sights enable quicker and, often, more-precise aiming than iron sights, due to the simplicity of a single-point aim.  They are also an improvement over red dot sights, though the difference is less significant than it is between red-dots and iron sights.  On the other hand, holographic sights heavier, bulkier, and more-expensive than red-dots.
